A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
i didnt like the movie. it made me sad and upset. so many plot holes and strange chsracters. luke Skywalker was my hero growing up and to see him admit he gave into his darkness and the thought of killing his nephew ben was completely disheartening. luke was a man who found the truth of his father. no one believed darth vader could be turned to the lightside.. yoda\, obiwan\, even leia couldn't see Vader becoming "good" yet luke persist. and brought his father back.

then to see that same man luke\, glimps into ben solo\, see potential darkness and gleem to murder his nephew didnt make sense to me. 
then Luke left a map to find him when the galaxy needs him only for rey to find him then luke say i came here to die. all a mess
